text:
### Project
```
POST /api/project
```

Get information about a project
Requester must be owner or joined in the project.

Request
```javascript
{
	project: "test_project",
	token: "39B696EFBECCBAFA5DBB80868627CC78D803D75F"
}
```

Response
```javascript
{
    "success": true,
    "project": {
        "id": 4,
        "name": "test_project",
        "owner": 3,
        "members": [
            {
                "username": "Yogsther",
                "name": "Olle Kaiser",
                "work": 0,
                "owner": true
            }
        ]
    }
}
```
title: POST project
